title: If you wish that the Authority has to carry out these development works, then you will have to deposit the estimated expenses to the Authority in advance, as decided by the Authority
clause_text: If you wish that the Authority has to carry out these development works, then you will have to deposit the estimated expenses to the Authority in advance, as decided by the Authority.
section: Duties and Responsibilities of Geotechnical Engineer :
